review: Great simple product.  Compact.  One MAJOR advantage over products like Chromcast is this comes with a remote.  Chromcast is annoying since it requires another device (phone/pad/computer); doing something simple like pausing, rewind, etc requires you to wake up your mobile, activate the app, wait for it to load the netflix data- THEN you can control it... It takes 1-2 minutes, Very annoying!  Contrary, Amazon Fire is ready to control the moment you want it.  😄👍🏼
